effects: Fixed damage (9x, MAG/SPR) to all enemies
Reduce ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 45% for 3 turns to all enemies
name: Flare

desc_short.0: Consume evocation gauge to damage and reduce ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies
desc_short.5: Consume la barra de invocación para dañar y reducir el ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP de todos los enemigos
